name: Shape Tunnel
description:
Welcome to Shape Tunnel: A Dimensional Challenge!
Prepare yourself for a mind-bending journey through twisting tunnels and geometric puzzles. In Shape Tunnel, you control a shape hurtling down an endless, ever-changing tunnel. Your mission? Match your shape to the constantly evolving tunnel geometry by deftly rotating the shapes in your path. Precision and quick thinking are your best allies - mismatch and it’s game over!

Features:

🌀 Shape-Matching Madness:

 Rotate and maneuver your shape to perfectly align with the tunnel. Every twist and turn demands split-second decisions. Can you keep up with the ever-shifting geometry?

💎 Collect Diamonds:

 Amidst the challenge, collect dazzling diamonds strewn throughout the tunnel.

🔮 Infinite Levels:

 With procedurally generated tunnels, your journey is never the same twice. Each level presents a new challenge, ensuring that your skills are continuously put to the test. How far can you go?

🕶️ Perspectacles Compatibility:

 Shape Tunnel is designed for an immersive experience with Perspectacles, the cutting-edge head tracking 3D glasses. Feel the thrill of the tunnel's twists and turns in stunning three-dimensional reality. The shapes come to life, and so does the challenge!

🎉 Endless Adventure:

 There's no limit to your adventure! Shape Tunnel offers infinite gameplay, ensuring that your pursuit of the perfect match never ends. How long can you keep the streak alive?

Dive into the depths of Shape Tunnel, where reflexes meet geometry, and every move counts. Can you conquer the ever-changing shapes, collect the diamonds, and navigate the tunnel's twists and turns? It’s time to find out!

Shape Tunnel: Match, Rotate, Conquer.
